sensors

Class UpdateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • sensors.UpdateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UpdateHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    A handler that repeatedly calls the "update" method of all Updateable objects in a given period of time.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bouke Stam

    • Method Detail

      • registerUpdatable

        public static void registerUpdatable(Updatable updatable,
                                     int interval)
        Add an updateable that will be called in a given interval. If instance is not initialized than create the object.
        Parameters:
        updatable - the object that gets called
        interval - the wait time before object gets called
